title: Looking to buy Plow Boy Tobacco Cards
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: Looking to buy Plow Boy Tobacco Cards
posts.post_content: I am looking for Plow Boy Tobacco Cabinet Cards. Prefer better condition but want to hear about any that might be for sale or trade. . Here is an example of Evers which I own. Cards of this grade are fine. Thanks

Rick, those are not very popular, in fact I suggest you get rid of yours while the gettin's good. As a friendly gesture I will take the Evers off your hands.:)

All kidding aside great Evers. Good luck with finding more.
